parameters.name: DbName
parameters.description: The name of the DRDS database.

parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the DRDS instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the resource group resides.

parameters.name: SourceTableName
parameters.description: The name of the source table.

parameters.name: TargetTableName
parameters.description: The name of the destination table.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description: The type of the task. Valid values:`  SHARD_TO_SINGLE `,`  SINGLE_TO_SHARD `,`  SHARD_TO_SHARD `.
